message: Let's be fair and divide it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I think 60-40 is not fair, how about we do 55-45?
I can do 57-43, it's a bit more than my initial offer, but I think it's fair considering the inflation is affecting me more
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think I should get a bit more, how about 58-42?
I'm taking a hit from inflation, so I'll meet you closer to the middle. 52-48 is my new offer
You're right that you're taking a bigger hit from inflation, but I think I can still get a bit more. How about 60-40?
